occurrences.context: ...o. Change your thinking. You're going to simply fall on His face, in His presence, and He's worthy. Revelation 4, notice in verse number 10, the 4 and 20 elders represented of the church fall down before Him that...

... look forward to one day being in your presence, worshipping you. We read that text of scripture in Revelation 4 and 5 and how our heart longs to be in your presence, to worship you, to see you face to face. God ...
